game.name: Elsa Restaurant Penne Pasta with Beans
game.description:
A famous chef and a nice human being Elsa is ready to cook a new and popular recipe in this fun restaurant cooking game for girls. Are you ready to help her in this highly challenging and electrifying free online game? Preparing penne pasta is not as difficult as you thought of. Try out Elsa Restaurant Penne Pasta with Beans at least once to learn this recipe by just following a few clicks on the mouse. Assist the beauty to satisfy the eating urges of one of her most loyal customers. She trusts on your cooking talent, so please don’t let her feel down in this cool game.

Find out all the needful ingredients at hand and use them in a proper order. Elsa is already very excited to play a most important role in her own restaurant. She is clearly aware of how to use the kitchen utensils in order to make the most out of the cooking world. The taste of her special dish will surprise the taste buds of people all over the world. Her first customer is no one other than her real sister – Anna, who is also looking very crazy to taste the new recipe. 

Start this brand new cooking game for girls and boys with dicing dill, onions and tomatoes. Use a pot and pour some olive oil in it. Also add some prepped ingredients together with fresh and extremely delicious beans. Use a stove to cook them properly. Also collect a pot with hot water and boil your penne in it. Use a plate to strain them. Don’t forget to add the bean mixture on the top. A nice texture will be obtained with the help of beans, while use the dill, onions and tomatoes to create a tasty sauce. Give your best to impress Anna! Good luck to score high in this brand new kitchen game!
